level.heading: References deemed to refer to the President and Chief Executive Officer of the Washington Convention and Sports Authority.
level.text: References in any District of Columbia law, rule, regulation, or the delegation of authority to the General Manager of the Washington Convention Center Authority, other than in ยง 10-1202.07(a-1), or the Chief Executive Officer and General Manager of the Washington Convention and Sports Authority shall be deemed to refer to the President and Chief Executive Officer of the Washington Convention and Sports Authority.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-356
level.text: For history of Law 18-356, see notes under ยง 10-306.
